mapper.insert: insert into GoodsTable(pno, pname, price, psize, pamount, pstate) values (null, #{p_name},#{p_price},#{p_size},#{p_amount},#{p_state})
mapper.select: select pno, pname, price, pstate from GoodsTable group by pname order by pno

select count(*) from GoodsTable
and pno like concat('%',#{searchtxt},'%')
and pname like concat('%',#{searchtxt},'%')

select pno, pname, price, psize, pamount, pstate from GoodsTable
and pno like concat('%',#{searchtxt},'%')
and pname like concat('%',#{searchtxt},'%')
limit #{startRow},#{endRow}
select pamount from GoodsTable where pno = ( select pno from CartTable where cno = #{cno} )
